/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors including shades of green, red, and white. These buildings are adorned with balconies and awnings, adding character to the cityscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the urban landscape.
